meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>cut</kanji> <kanji>token</kanji> is a token you cut out from a sheet of paper into smaller sheets, and each of these pieces is a <vocabulary>ticket</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is 切る cut short to きっ, then ふ rendaku'd to ぷ. It's a bit of a troublesome word, so concentrate on this now a bit so you can get it in the reviews.
